14----------------------- CHANGE HISTORY --------------------------
15
16 1/29/84 Allowed use on standard input
17 2/1/84 Added E, N, P commands
18 4/17/84 Added '=' command, 'stop' signal handling
19 4/20/84 Added line folding
20v2 4/27/84 Fixed '=' command to use BOTTOM_PLUS_ONE,
21 instead of TOP, added 'p' & 'v' commands
22v3 5/3/84 Added -m and -t options, '-' command
23v4 5/3/84 Added LESS environment variable
24v5 5/3/84 New comments, fixed '-' command slightly
25v6 5/15/84 Added -Q, visual bell
26v7 5/24/84 Fixed jump_back(n) bug: n should count real
27 lines, not folded lines. Also allow number on G command.
28v8 5/30/84 Re-do -q and -Q commands
29v9 9/25/84 Added "+<cmd>" argument
30v10 10/10/84 Fixed bug in -b<n> argument processing
31v11 10/18/84 Made error() ring bell if \n not entered.
32-----------------------------------------------------------------
33v12 2/13/85 Reorganized signal handling and made portable to 4.2bsd.
34v13 2/16/85 Reword error message for '-' command.
35v14 2/22/85 Added -bf and -bp variants of -b.
36v15 2/25/85 Miscellaneous changes.
37v16 3/13/85 Added -u flag for backspace processing.
38v17 4/13/85 Added j and k commands, changed -t default.
39v18 4/20/85 Rewrote signal handling code.
40v19 5/2/85 Got rid of "verbose" eq_message().
41 Made search() scroll in some cases.
42v20 5/21/85 Fixed screen.c ioctls for System V.
43v21 5/23/85 Fixed some first_cmd bugs.
44v22 5/24/85 Added support for no RECOMP nor REGCMP.
45v23 5/25/85 Miscellanous changes and prettying up.
46 Posted to USENET.
47-----------------------------------------------------------------
48v24 6/3/85 Added ti,te terminal init & de-init.
49 (Thanks to Mike Kersenbrock)
50v25 6/8/85 Added -U flag, standout mode underlining.
51v26 6/9/85 Added -M flag.
52 Use underline termcap (us) if it exists.
53v27 6/15/85 Renamed some variables to make unique in
54 6 chars. Minor fix to -m.
55v28 6/28/85 Fixed right margin bug.
56v29 6/28/85 Incorporated M.Rose's changes to signal.c
57v30 6/29/85 Fixed stupid bug in argument processing.
58v31 7/15/85 Added -p flag, changed repaint algorithm.
59 Added kludge for magic cookie terminals.
60v32 7/16/85 Added cat_file if output not a tty.
61v33 7/23/85 Added -e flag and EDITOR.
62v34 7/26/85 Added -s flag.
63v35 7/27/85 Rewrote option handling; added option.c.
64v36 7/29/85 Fixed -e flag to work if not last file.
65v37 8/10/85 Added -x flag.
66v38 8/19/85 Changed prompting; created prompt.c.
67v39 8/24/85 (Not -p) does not initially clear screen.
68v40 8/26/85 Added "skipping" indicator in forw().
69 Posted to USENET.
70-----------------------------------------------------------------
71v41 9/17/85 ONLY_RETURN, control char commands,
72 faster search, other minor fixes.
73v42 9/25/85 Added ++ command line syntax;
74 ch_fsize for pipes.
75v43 10/15/85 Added -h flag, changed prim.c algorithms.
76v44 10/16/85 Made END print in all cases of eof;
77 ignore SIGTTOU after receiv ing SIGTSTP.
78v45 10/16/85 Never print backspaces unless -u.
79v46 10/24/85 Backwards scroll in jump_loc.
80v47 10/30/85 Fixed bug in edit(): *first_cmd==0
81v48 11/16/85 Use TIOCSETN instead of TIOCSETP.
82 Added marks (m and ' commands).
83 Posted to USENET.
84-----------------------------------------------------------------
85v49 1/9/86 Fixed bug: signal didn't clear mcc.
86v50 1/15/86 Added ' (quote) to gomark.
87v51 1/16/86 Added + cmd, fixed problem if first_cmd
88 fails, made g cmd sort of "work" on pipes
89 ev en if bof is no longer buffered.
90v52 1/17/86 Made short files work better.
91v53 1/20/86 Added -P option.
92v54 1/20/86 Changed help to use HELPFILE.
93v55 1/23/86 Messages work better if not tty output.
94v56 1/24/86 Added -l option.
95v57 1/31/86 Fixed -l to get confirmation before
96 ov erwriting an existing file.
97v58 8/28/86 Added filename globbing.
98v59 9/15/86 Fixed some bugs with very long filenames.
99v60 9/26/86 Incorporated changes from Leith (Casey)
100 Leedom for boldface and -z option.
101v61 9/26/86 Got rid of annoying repaints after ! cmd.
102 Posted to USENET.
103-----------------------------------------------------------------
104v62 12/23/86 Added is_directory(); change -z default to
105 -1 instead of 24; cat-and-exit if -e and
106 file is less than a screenful.
107v63 1/8/87 Fixed bug in cat-and-exit if > 1 file.
108v64 1/12/87 Changed puts/putstr, putc/putchr,
109 getc/getchr to av oid name conflict with
110 stdio functions.
111v65 1/26/87 Allowed '-' command to change NUMBER
112 v alued options (thanks to Gary Puckering)
113v66 2/13/87 Fixed bug: prepaint should use force=1.
114v67 2/24/87 Added !! and % expansion to ! command.
115v68 2/25/87 Added SIGWINCH and TIOCGWINSZ support;
116 changed is_directory to bad_file.
117 (thanks to J. Robert Ward)
118v69 2/25/87 Added SIGWIND and WIOCGETD (for Unix PC).
119v70 3/13/87 Changed help cmd from 'h' to 'H'; better
120 error msgs in bad_file, errno_message.
121v71 5/11/87 Changed -p to -c, made triple -c/-C
122 for clear-eol like more's -c.
123v72 6/26/87 Added -E, -L, use $SHELL in lsystem().
124 (thanks to Stev e Spearman)
125v73 6/26/87 Allow Examine "#" for previous file.
126 Posted to USENET 8/25/87.
127-----------------------------------------------------------------
128v74 9/18/87 Fix conflict in EOF symbol with stdio.h,
129 Make os.c more portable to BSD.
130v75 9/23/87 Fix problems in get_term (thanks to
131 Paul Eggert); new backwards scrolling in
132 jump_loc (thanks to Marion Hakanson).
133v76 9/23/87 Added -i flag; allow single "!" to
134 inv oke a shell (thanks to Franco Barber).
135v77 9/24/87 Added -n flag and line number support.
136v78 9/25/87 Fixed problem with prompts longer than
137 the screen width.
138v79 9/29/87 Added the _ command.
139v80 10/6/87 Allow signal to break out of linenum scan.
140v81 10/6/87 Allow -b to be changed from within less.
141v82 10/7/87 Add cmd_decode to use a table for key
142 binding (thanks to Dav id Nason).
143v83 10/9/87 Allow .less file for user-defined keys.
144v84 10/11/87 Fix -e/-E problems (thanks to Felix Lee).
145v85 10/15/87 Search now keeps track of line numbers.
146v86 10/20/87 Added -B option and autobuf; fixed
147 "pipe error" bug.
148v87 3/1/88 Fix bug re BSD signals while reading file.
149v88 3/12/88 Use new format for -P option (thanks to
150 der Mouse), allow "+-c" without message,
151 fix bug re BSD hangup.
152v89 3/18/88 Turn off line numbers if linenum scan
153 is interrupted.
154v90 3/30/88 Allow -P from within less.
155v91 3/30/88 Added tags file support (new -t option)
156 (thanks to Brian Campbell).
157v92 4/4/88 Added -+option syntax.
158v93 4/11/88 Add support for slow input (thanks to
159 Joe Orost & apologies for taking almost
160 3 years to get this in!)
161v94 4/11/88 Redo reading/signal stuff.
162v95 4/20/88 Repaint screen better after signal.
163v96 4/21/88 Add /! and ?! commands.
164v97 5/17/88 Allow -l/-L from within less.
165 Eliminate some static arrays (use calloc).
166 Posted to USENET.
167-----------------------------------------------------------------
168v98 10/14/88 Fix incorrect calloc call; uninitialized
169 var in exec_mca; core dump on unknown TERM.
170 Make v cmd work if past last line of file.
171 Fix some signal bugs.
172v99 10/29/88 Allow space between -X and string,
173 when X is a string-valued option.
174v100 1/5/89 Fix globbing bug when $SHELL not set;
175 allow spaces after -t command.
176v101 1/6/89 Fix problem with long (truncated) lines
177 in tags file (thanks to Neil Dixon).
178v102 1/6/89 Fix bug with E# when no prev file;
179 allow spaces after -l command.
180v103 3/14/89 Add -N, -f and -? options. Add z and w
181 commands. Add %L for prompt strings.
182v104 3/16/89 Added EDITPROTO.
183v105 3/20/89 Fix bug in find_linenum which cached
184 incorrectly on long lines.
185v106 3/31/89 Added -k option and multiple lesskey
186 files.
187v107 4/27/89 Add 8-bit char support and -g option.
188 Split option code into 3 files.
189v108 5/5/89 Allocate position table dynamically
190 (thanks to Paul Eggert); change % command
191 from "percent" to vi-style brace finder.
192v109 5/10/89 Added ESC-% command, split prim.c.
193v110 5/24/89 Fixed bug in + option; fixed repaint bug
194 under Sun windows (thanks to Paul Eggert).
195v111 5/25/89 Generalized # and % expansion; use
196 calloc for some error messages.
197v112 5/30/89 Get rid of ESC-%, add {}()[] commands.
198v113 5/31/89 Optimize lseeks (thanks to Paul Eggert).
199v114 7/25/89 Added ESC-/ and ESC-/! commands.
200v115 7/26/89 Added ESC-n command.
201v116 7/31/89 Added find_pos to optimize g command.
202v117 8/1/89 Change -f option to -r.
203v118 8/2/89 Save positions for all previous files,
204 not just the immediately previous one.
205v119 8/7/89 Save marks across file boundaries.
206 Add file handle stuff.
207v120 8/11/89 Add :ta command.
208v121 8/16/89 Add -f option.
209v122 8/30/89 Fix performance with many buffers.
210v123 8/31/89 Verbose prompts for string options.
211 Posted beta to USENET.

214 N = rev, ESC-n = span, add ESC-N.

238 to Richard Brittain).

254v151 4/13/90 Remove -g option; clean up ispipe.
255v152 4/14/90 lsystem() closes input file, for
256 editors which require exclusive open.
257v153 4/18/90 Fix bug if SHELL unset;
258 fix bug in overstrike control char.
259v154 4/25/90 Output to fd 2 via buffer.
260v155 4/30/90 Ignore -i if uppercase in pattern
261 (thanks to Michael Rendell.)

263 causes problems with -c.
264v157 5/4/90 Forward search starts at next real line
265 (not screen line) after jump target.
266v158 6/14/90 Added F command.
267v159 7/29/90 Fix bug in exiting: output not flushed.
268v160 7/29/90 Clear screen before initial output w/ -c.

271v163 8/21/90 Added LESSBINFMT variable.

273 unset mark ' == BOF, for 1003.2 D5.

275 screen when try to page forward.

279v169 12/12/90 G goes to EOF even if file has grown.
